Nxchange - www.nxchange.com | Amsterdam | Full-Time | FinTech | ONSITE

We launched a next generation stock exchange for direct trading in securities between companies and investors in April â€™16. Here is a nice video of what we do and try to achieve: https://www.nxchange.com/s/webm/homepage-intro.mp4

Please get in touch via j.verhoeve@nxchange.com if you're interested in one of our roles.
